name: The crimson vestments of Vulcthay
data: It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence unbelievably much.
It decreases the users charisma unbelievably much.
It has feeble armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration unbelievably much.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'stunning blow'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'channel power'.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
